titles.title: SCHIP Territorial Allocation Equity Act of 2003
To amend title XXI of the Social Security Act to provide for the allocation of allotment under the State Children's Health Insurance Program (SCHIP) to territories in the same manner as for States.
SCHIP Territorial Allocation Equity Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

term.name: Federal aid to child health services

bill.summary: SCHIP Territorial Allocation Equity Act of 2003 - Amends title XXI (State Children's Health Insurance) (SCHIP) of the Social Security Act to provide for the allocation of SCHIP allotments to territories in the same manner as for States.
